title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 574.7 - Traffic controls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 574.7 - Traffic controls

State Regulations
(a) The
following traffic controls are applicable to the grounds of the State

University of New York, College of Technology at Delhi, unless otherwise
stated. (b) Twenty MPH is the
maximum speed limit at which vehicles may proceed on or along all roadways
except as provided in subdivision (c) of this section. (c) Fifteen MPH is the maximum speed limit at
which vehicles may proceed on or along the following roadways: (1)

Main campus roadway between its
intersection with the north exit from Parking Lot E and the projected south
building line of South Hall (Bldg. #4). (2)

Main campus roadway between its
intersection with the roadway to Parking Lot B and a point 50± feet north of
O'Connor Hall (Bldg. #31). (d) The following intersections are
designated at STOP intersections: Intersection of

(f) All through traffic is prohibited in the
service area between Buildings #8 and #32. Appropriate signs are ordered to be
erected on each end of the roadway through the subject service area. (g) In accordance with section 1681(d) of the

New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law, the State University of New York is to
provide and maintain signs in conformance with the Manual of Uniform Traffic

Control Devices of New York State to post the regulations established above. Footnotes
*
Back River Road is a Town of

Delhi roadway at the intersections indicated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§
574.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
